newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT -- Intuit cut to hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT -- Intuit cut to hold.

text.p: -- Deutsche Morgan Grenfell said it downgraded Intuit Inc to hold from accumulate.
-- said Intuit's revenue growth for the first half of 1997 has slowed. DMG said it now expects Intuit to post fiscal year 1997 growth of 13 percent.
-- said operating margins may increase as Intuit cuts costs to offset lower revenues.
-- said Intuit may achieve its earnings per share growth target this year by managing costs. Says next year's earnings will be lower than expected. Additional details were not immediately available.
